casebody.data:
Bernel CAMPBELL, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. CITY OF NEW YORK, Defendant-Appellee. No. 03-7293. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 29, 2004. Bernel Campbell, New York, NY, pro se. *316Janet L. Zaleon, Assistant Corporation, Counsel, New York, NY, for Appellee.

PRESENT: MESKILL, KATZMANN, and WESLEY, Circuit Judges.

SUMMARY ORDER

Plaintiff-appellant Bernel Campbell, pro se, asks that we consider whether the district court correctly denied Campbell’s motions to amend the complaint to conform to the evidence and for a new trial. We conclude that the district court committed no error.

For the reasons set forth, we AFFIRM the order of the District Court.
